attributes.action: ban the use of glue traps to kill or capture any wild animal includinng those classed as vermin.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Glue traps which are opposed by the RSPCA cause immense and prolonged suffering.  The trapped creature is stuck to the board by its cheek; paws; eye or wherever it touched the board.  Then often bleeding from where it has torn or bitten parts of it's self in a vain attempt to get free it suffers  until the trapper turns up, which can be days latter when the animal has already died of dehydration and starvation
